reviews.review: Играл в эту помойку 5 лет набивал ранг, и тут бац и обнулил все ранги что общий что рейтинг, игра говно, стрельба говно не в прицел, еще и баги игры постоянно встречаются. Тупо не скачивайте игру и не покупайте, разрабы ничего не делают, а тупо зарабатывают деньги.
counter strike is ver y good
I very much like this game, I think im addicted to it!
Really fun game, but I would suggest buying prime because without you dont get as much as enjoyment. The skins will make you gamble pretty hard so watchout for that and yeah game good.
I actually spend more time in the SDK than in game + I have a weird crashing bug, but that might just be my PC dying. I wish 3kliksphilip was my dad

Let's just start off by saying if you suck then you will be yelled at for throwing the game, but other then that its one of the best/worst games in the universe, the caliber of bullets coming off these guns are like being sprayed in a hot tub, hot garbo.
